Items.Name: Jallosh 2018
Items.Description:
Gate Opens: Friday, 5:00 PM                                                   Event Starts: Friday, 06:00 PM

Avdhoot Gupte live musical concert "Jallosh 2018" 

A Marathi musical treat in Dubai presented by Morya Events Dubai in association with Meraki Events. 
For the first time in Dubai, Avdhoot Gupte will be Performing with a live band of musicians. 
Friday 21st Dec 2018 at Sheikh Rashid Auditorium Dubai.

Avadhoot Gupte is an Indian music composer and singer who is popularly known for his work in the Marathi film and music. Avadhoot started his career as a composer in the year 2002 when he composed a basic album of 8 songs on the theme of Rain (Marathi Title "Paus"). Avadhoot shot into fame instantly with this album and received the "Alpha Gaurav Puraskar" for the Best Composer 2002 for this album. 


His second album as a composer was an Indi-Pop album called "Aika Dajiba" which is considered to be a landmark in the field of Indian Pop Music. "Aika Dajiba" started the trend of Hindi pop songs with a Marathi punch line. His song received an unparalleled response from audiences of all ages worldwide. This album was followed with yet another super hit album "Meri Madhubala" which launched him as a pop singer. Thus from the first album, he composed, to his latest Avadhoot has an excellent track record of hits in an extremely short span of two years. 


In short, this young composer has started setting trends in the Indian music scene with his creativity and ability to experiment with different kinds of music. 

• Avdhoot was a judge at a most popular TV Show Sa Re Ga Ma Pa Little Champions on Zee Marathi. 
• Avdhoot moved to anchor a talk show on Zee Marathi titled Khupte Tithe Gupte. 
• Recently this year was a judge at popular Marathi Tv musical show Sur Nava Dhyas Nava for Colors Marathi. His first venture as a director was 2010 Marathi film, Zenda. 
• In his second venture, Morya, he touched the social subject of the famous Ganesh Festival in Mumbai.
• His third film titled was Jai Maharashtra Dhaba, Bhatinda. 
• As a producer, he gave a super hit blockbuster last year with Boyz and the sequel of Boyz 2 is to be released this coming year.

Items.Name: DJ AQEEL LIVE IN CONCERT
Items.Description:
DJ Aqeel, aka Aqeel Ali, has been rocking the dance floors across the globe for more than a
decade. Known as the ‘DON’ or the ‘DADDY’ of remixes, DJ Aqeel is among the first few to
pioneer Bollywood remixes and dance music in India.

DJ Aqeel lives in Mumbai with his wife Farah Khan Ali, who is the daughter of actor Sanjay Khan, and is the sister of the Bollywood actor Zayed Khan. The couple has one son and one daughter, Azaan born on 7 May 2002 and Fizaa born on 2 April 2005. He owned Hype Nightclub in Atria Mall in Worli, Mumbai, also in Delhi’s Hotel Shangrila and in Ludhiana known as Urban Hara(Hype).

This event is strictly 21+. Security has the right to ask for a valid UAE ID or original passport at any time. In the event of failing providing your age proof, you'll be asked to leave the venue and no-refund policy will apply.

Albums

  • Aur Ek Haseena Thi (T-Series)
  • The Daddy Mix (UMI-10)
  • The return to the Daddy Mix (UMI-10)
  • Ek Hasina Thi (UMI-10)
  • DJ Aqeel Forever (Saregama)
  • Don Remix (UMI-10)
  • DJ Aqeel Forever 2 (2012) (Saregama)
  • DJ Aqeel Forever 3 (2014) (Saregama)

Items.Alt: Formula 1 Etihad Airways Abu Dhabi Grand Prix 2019
Items.Name: Formula 1 Etihad Airways Abu Dhabi Grand Prix 2019
Items.Description: The Yas Marina Circuit hosts F1's only twilight race, creating a magical atmosphere as day turns to night under the lights. The Yas Marina Circuit has already been admired as an enjoyable and unique circuit that presents challenges like an anti-clockwise direction and an underground pit lane, to the drivers in the last race of the season. Abu Dhabi Grand Prix makes it all the more exciting with its glamour, hospitality and top-class entertainment. Abu Dhabi Grand Prix is also famous for its celebrity-studded after-parties alongside performances by some of the world’s biggest rock-stars and the celebrations at Yasalam After Race Concerts

Items.Name: Yas Marina Circuit Tour
Items.Description:
If you are an avid Formula 1 racing fan, you must take the Guided Tour of Yas Marina Circuit. This track is used for the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix. The track also has a drag racing circuit that hosts many races throughout the year. You are taken on a ride of the track in air conditioned vehicles. You get to see the track just like a Formula 1 race car driver. You also stop at important locations including the Yas Marina Grandstand, pit garages, paddock area and the state-of-the-art media centre. The guided tour is a great way to know motorsports like never before. If you like racing, this tour is something must indulge in. Go on the tour today and feel like a race car driver.

So, Book now your Yas Marina Ticket in affordable prices with meraTicket

Important Information

  • Kindly Carry your Photo ID with you as they need to be produced at the time of entrance.
  • Tour Operational days & timings Tuesday to Saturday (10:00 - 12:00 & 14:00 - 16:00)
  • Tour timings may also vary due to weather conditions.

Inclusions

  • Special photo session at the podium

Items.Name: Sunil Grover Unplugged
Items.Description:
Sunil Grover (born 3 August 1977) is an Indian actor and stand up comedian. He came into limelight for his portrayal as Gutthi on Comedy Nights with Kapil but gained popularity for playing the role of Dr Mashoor Gulati on The Kapil Sharma Show. Grover will next be seen in Bollywood film Bharat.

Early life and family background

Sunil Grover was born in a Punjabi Hindu family of Mandi Dabwali, a small town of Sirsa, Haryana. His father was a bank manager. He has an elder sister and a younger brother. He completed his schooling from Mandi Dabwali and completed graduation from Guru Nanak College. He received master's degree in Theatre from Panjab University Chandigarh. He was interested in acting from his childhood and used to mimic his teachers.

Acting career

Sunil was discovered during his college days by the late satirist and comedian Jaspal Bhatti.[5] He has also acted in India's first silent comedy show, SAB TV's Gutur Gu in the initial 26 episodes. He was with comedian Kapil Sharma in the comedy show Comedy Nights with Kapil and became popular for playing comical characters: Gutthi, Rinku Bhabi and Dr. Mashoor Gulati.[6][7] Sunil debuted in the Punjab film industry, with Vaisakhi List in 2016 and the same year he portrayed the role of Shraddha Kapoor's father in the Baaghi movie.
Items.PageDescription: Sunil Grover Unplugged at Sheikh Rashid Auditorium on 29th Mar 2019 tickets starting from AED 65.

Items.Name: SKI DUBAI
Items.Description:
Take a break from the heat of Dubai and head to the ski park in the Mall of Emirates. Now, you do not have to wait in the long queue to get your tickets. We can arrange you the tickets for the direct entry to the park.

Nothing short of a wonder, Ski Park have been created inside a mall. Spread across an area of 22,500 square feet, the park includes an awesome snow park, five slopes of different heights and sizes and a really huge skiing area. You can try your hand at skiing, tobogganing and snowboarding and a lot of other adventures here.

You do not have to worry about the clothes and accessories that you need inside the cold atmosphere of the Ski Park. Right from the winter jacket to gloves, helmets and boots, everything would be provided just outside the park. They also provide you with skiing and snowboarding activities.

Whate1ver is your age, the ski park and snow world offer entertainment to everybody. So book your tickets with us and enjoy the rides, attractions, and activities of this wonderful park.

Important Information

  • The minimum skill requirement for use of the recreational slope is | stopping safely | Speed control | Linked turns | Ability to use the lifts.
  • Ski Dubai reserves the right to request proof of age.
  • The Ski Dubai Operational hours are Sunday - Wednesday: 10.00 am - 11.00 pm , Thursday: 10.00 am - 12.00 midnight , Friday: 09.00 am - 12.00 midnight , Saturday: 09.00 am - 11.00 pm
  • Location Address - Ski Dubai(Chinese Nationality Only), Sheikh Zayed Rd - Dubai

Special Note:-

  • Ski Dubai Management is authorize to refuse the entry, if they found this ticket holding by any nationality other then Chinese.

Inclusions

  • Ski Dubai Tickets (Depends on selection)
  • Experience all winter activities imaginable
  • Enjoy snowballing, try tobogganing, and create snowman, among others

Items.Name: Warner Bros World Abu Dhabi
Items.Description:
Come July 2018, Abu Dhabi adds a new feather to its cap with the inauguration of Warner Bros Abu Dhabi. Located in Yas Island, the Warner Bros Abu Dhabi brings alive all your Warner Bros favorite characters through interesting zones, thrilling rides and attractions as well as live entertainment. This is one amusement park that you should not miss if you love everything about Warner Bros.

If you are interested in visiting this theme park and do not want to wait in a queue on the opening day, give us call and we can arrange the entry tickets for you. Upon entering the park, you would be able to visit six interesting zones, namely Warner Bros. Plaza, Cartoon Junction, Gotham City, Dynamite Gulch and Bedrock. You would not only be able to enjoy 29 exciting rides but would also be able to meet your favourite characters, right from Bugs Bunny and Scooby-Doo to Batman and Superman.

Warner Bros World Abu Dhabi has lot of restaurants and shops where you can have a great time with your family and friends. Along with the entry tickets, we would also arrange transportation for those who choose this tour package..

Inclusions

  • Warner Bros World Admission Tickets
  • Discover six lands themed around the all-time favorite DC comic characters and superheroes 
  • Ride some of the most thrilling 4D and 5D attractions 
  • Enjoy striking shows and attractions

Items.Name: Dhow Cruise Dinner - Marina
Items.Description:
Experience something that is inexplicable and beyond your imagination with our 2-hour classy cruise. The Venetian styled canal will leave you and your loved ones impressed. This traditional dhow will offer you the best views of modern Dubai from the most unexpected angles. Witness the glorious architectures of Dubai that the world acknowledges while you feast on the international cuisines. An elegant and sophisticated setting will elevate your cruising experience and leave you with lovely memories to cherish for a lifetime.

Entertainment will be arranged onboard and you will be cruising over the Dubai’s Marina while enjoying the savory dishes and a complimentary drink. The stunning view, sumptuous meals and the live entertainment will give you a dazzling experience. Do not hesitate to call and check all the details with us. We have an instant chat option to help you with your queries.

Items.Name: Ferrari World Theme Park
Items.Description:
Make your trip to UAE exciting and adventurous with a visit to Ferrari World in Abu Dhabi's Yas Island. This is a one of a kind indoor theme park with F1 racing as its main theme. As the major highlight of F1 racing is high speed, so is the theme of this theme park.

The Ferrari World is spread in an area of 86,000 square meters and has been built using 12,000 tons of steel.has numerous thrilling rides like Formula Rossa, The Racing Legends, Bell'Italia, Fiorana GT Challenge, Junior GT, Speed of Magic, Scuderia Challenge, Paddock, etc. Amongst these rides, the Formula Rossa is the most popular one. Running at the speed of 240 km/hour, it is the fastest of the lot.

Apart from enjoying the various breathtaking rides, you can also shop at the Formula One souvenir shop. There are also dining options for the hungry tummies.

We can arrange this adventurous trip for you. All you need to do is call us or write to us, and we would ensure you have a fabulous time.

Tickets Type:

  • Ferrari World Standard: This is the general admission ticket of the Ferrari world which includes unlimited access to the park.
  • Ferrari world Premium: This ticket includes unlimited fast pass access to the Ferrari World theme park.

Important Information

  • Guests can display voucher on mobile phone or carry a hard copy of the Tickets downloaded with valid photo ID at the entrance booth of Ferrari World Abu Dhabi.
  • All children below 12 years must be accompanied by an adult over 18 years old and each must have their own ticket and a valid Emirates ID or a Passport copy for the age proof.
  • The height range for the Formula Rossa activity is between 145 - 195 CMs.
  • Lockers are available in the Plaza level entrance area for with an additional charge of AED 35 per locker and Luggage storage with an additional charge from AED 45.
  • Strollers are available for rent from the Stroller Rental Counter at the Plaza level entrance with an additional charge from AED 40.
  • Prayer rooms are located on the Plaza level.
  • A smoking area is located on the Plaza level
  • A valet parking service is available at the park with an additional charge of AED

Inclusions

  • General Admission ticket to Ferrari world Abu Dhabi
  • All roller coaster rides

Items.Name: Louvre Abu Dhabi
Items.Description:
While Abu Dhabi is applauded for its culture, the Louvre Museum is the exceptional manifestation of it. Seated beautifully on Saadiyat Island by the award winning architect, the museum explains the historical times through an array of displays. Resources like the artifacts, objects, statues and paintings re-tell the global creativity from ancient and contemporary periods. The context revolves on four chapters, Archaeology, Medieval, Classical and Modern Age. Travelling back to time, you can find that the artworks are arranged in the chronological order giving you an ease in understanding and exploring the past. Topping the charts as both architectural marvel and historical collaboration, Louvre Abu Dhabi is an inescapable trip. 

The textual and multimedia works are supported by several languages that help visitors in finding relevancy with the objects of rich history. This interesting museum filled with the game of sunlight and water canal is undoubtedly a precious moment to restore. Buy tickets with us and get admission to the museum, galleries, exhibitions, Children’s museum and grand public space. Connect with our team and get special offers that let you enjoy great time. 

Important Information

  • You are required to carry a Hard Copy of the E-Ticket which you will receive through Email.
  • Restrooms are available throughout the venue.
  • Prayer rooms for both men and women are located in the Forum.
  • A First Aid room is available in the Forum.
  • Strollers, Lockers and Wheelchairs are available on extra charge in the main hall.
  • The Louvre Abu Dhabi Operational hours are Saturday - Wednesday: 10.00 am - 08.00 pm and Thursday - Friday: 10.00 am - 10.00 pm

Special Note :

  • Louvre Abu Dhabi is closed on Monday. Last entry and purchase 30 Minutes prior to close

Inclusions

  • Gain entry to the Arabian world’s first Universal Museum 
  • Discover over 600 artworks arranged in 12 distinct sequences 
  • Admire permanent exhibits that date back to 3rd BC 
  • See classic masterpieces loaned from legendary French institutions like Louvre Museum 
  • Enjoy its unique architecture that creates an impressive rain of light effect
Items.PageDescription: The finest museum Loure Abu Dhabi  tickets book online with meraTicket.com. Discounted price only at meraTicket at Just AED 55.

Items.Name: The Rotunda Dubai
Items.Description:
One of the newest and most unique attractions of the Emirate city is the Rotunda Dubai. It is an entertainment destination located at the Ceasers Palace in Bluewaters Island Resort. The Rotunda Dubai's design has been inspired by the Pantheon in Rome. The theatre has 500 seats that allows 360o view. With the introduction of this entertainment destination, get ready for some marvellous shows, live acts and entertainment in the city of Dubai.

Apart from the class entertainment acts, the Rotunda Dubai is also popular for its hospitality and the first class dining options. You can choose to dine at Zhen Wei Dim Sum or perhaps Gordon Ramsay Hell's Kitchen.

You can check their website or give us a call to know about the shows that are currently running at the Rotunda Dubai. We can book your tickets as per your preference as well as availability. Once purchased, the tickets cannot be reimbursed or cancelled.

Important Information

  • You will receive an E-Ticket through Mail. Guest are required to show the E-Ticket at the Entrance.
  • Kindly note the seat selection will be subject to availability at the time of the booking
  • Ticket needs to be purchased for the children 3 years and above.
  • A 20 minutes break is scheduled between all shows.
  • Children below the age of 3 are discouraged from admission regardless of being accompanied with parents.
  • The Booking Confirmation is valid only for the specific date and time shown thereon and shall automatically expire upon the lapse of this specific date and time.
  • Location Address - Caesars Palace, Bluewaters Island - Dubai

Inclusions

  • Entry ticket to the Pantheon-inspired Rotunda Dubai

Items.Name: Yas Waterworld
Items.Description:
Yas Water World, located in Yas Island of Abu Dhabi, is the largest water park in the Emirate city of Abu Dhabi. New York Times rated it as the second best water park in the world. This exciting park gives you a glimpse of the culture and heritage of UAE while increasing your adrenaline rush. The theme of the park is based on pearl diving, the occupation followed in UAE before oil was discovered. Apart from the pearl diving experience, the Yas Water World boasts of more than 43 rides, slides, and roller coasters.

The most popular water ride in this 15-hectare land is the hydromagnetic waterslide, which is also the largest in the world. The other rides in this water park include Rush Rider, Marah Fortress, Dawwama, etc. So, if you love adventure, the Yas Water World is sure to entice as well as enthral you.

Book your ticket to the Yas Water World today and make the thrilling experience your own!

Special Note :

  • Enjoy unlimited all day access to Yas Waterworld Abu Dhabi and have an absolute blast at one of the world’s best waterparks, an iconic must-visit destination that promises legendary adventures.
  • Don't miss our 5 one-of-a-kind rides that will not be found anywhere else in the world. With over 40 rip-roaring rides, slithering slides and attractions that range from adrenalin-pumping to suitable for young ones, there's fun for the taking - simply add water!
  • Free meal included with your ticket, simply present it at Chubby’s Kitchen Restaurant to redeem across mouthwatering combo with your choice of a soft drink or bottle of water.

Important Information

  • Operational hours for this activity from Fridays to Wednesdays will be between 10:00 am to 7:00 pm and on Thursdays will be between 10:00 am to 5:00 pm / 6:00 pm to 11:00 pm
  • Customer will be Solely Responsible for Loss of Tickets.
  • Timings will be subject to change in the month of Ramadan.
  • Yas Waterworld announces the closure of Yadi Yas ride for some improvements currently until further notice.

Inclusions

  • General admission entrance ticket
  • The ticket includes all the amazing rides
  • Enjoy your favorite rides without waiting in long queues by opting for premium tickets

Items.Name: iFLY Dubai
Items.Description:
Dubai is a popular destination for sky diving. However, if you cannot stomach the idea of jumping from an airplane, thousands of feet above the ground, you may like the idea of doing the same in a safer environment. iFly Dubai is the first sky diving place in UAE where you can experience sky diving in an enclosed space.

Located on the third floor of Play Nation Area in Mirdif, iFly is perfect for kids (above three years) and adults who are looking for some adventure. With iFly Dubai tour package from Rayna Tours, you get admission tickets and the chance to go sky diving. Before you jump into the vertical glass wind tunnel, you would be provided with a 20 minutes briefing session by an expert. All flying gear including flying suit, helmet, goggle and disposable socks are provided with the ticket.

If you are still not confident about this, you would be happy to know that an instructor would be guiding you during the entire duration you are in the tunnel. Photos and videos are taken during the session. However, you would have to pay extra if you want them.  

Important Information

  • All the participants must arrive 1 hour prior to the flight time selected.
  • Pregnant women are not allowed for this activity.
  • Participants should be above 3 years of age
  • Participants must not be over 115 Kg.
  • Location Address - Third Floor, Play Nation Area, City Centre Mirdif? Ghoroob, Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road - United Arab Emirates
  • Subject to Availability

Inclusions

  • iFly Admission Tickets 
  • 20 mins briefing session
  • IFLY Gear: Flying Suite, Helmet, disposable socks & goggle
  • 1 to 1 tunnel session with iFLY Instructor
  • Photos/Videos available at an Additional Cost
Items.PageDescription: ifly Dubai ticket are available in cheapest rate at just AED 173.  Book tickets online of ifly in Dubai Get greatest experience of indoor sky diving.

Items.Name: Legoland Dubai
Items.Description:
Our Legoland Dubai admission passes with pick up and drop off allow you to experience an incredibly fun and imaginative world, fascinatingly themed around LEGO toy-building bricks! With a wide spectrum of games, rides and other attractions on its extensive three million square feet, Legoland Dubai is aimed to amuse enthusiastic kids of 2 to 12 years.

At Lego City, let your kid pilot a plane, steer a boat or even perform some heroic deeds by rescuing a burning structure. For your little ones including toddlers, Legoland Dubai’s Imagination has some remarkable attractions by way of Duplo Valley, Kid Power Towers, and 4D Theater displaying Lego-based movies. With a trip to Factory, learn how Lego bricks are manufactured, in addition to exploring the Middle East’s largest Lego store.

Moreover, visit the park’s sections like Kingdoms and Adventure to engage in extraordinary thrill, thanks to its many highlights: Pharaoh’s Revenge,Lost Kingdom Adventure, and Merlin’s Flying Machine. And one zone you can’t miss in Legoland Dubai is Miniland – a place to marvel the mindblowing Lego art and creativity. Be in awe at the life-size Lego models here, representing the most iconic attractions of not only Dubai and UAE but also the Middle East. 

Important Information

  • River Land Uniquely themed Retail and dining destination at the heart of Dubai Parks and Resorts comprising of 4 themed Zones and featuring more than 50 Shops and Restaurants opened to Guests free of charge.
  • The GCC Residence offer is for the Residents of UAE, KSA, Oman, Bahrain and Kuwait Only. All guests will be required to present a valid Resident ID at the ticketing gate to redeem this offer.
  • For each valid GCC Resident ID shown, a maximum of 5 tickets per park for the day can be redeemed.
  • Dubai Parks and Resorts Operational hours may vary in the month of Ramadan.
  • No eating or drinking outdoors is permitted in the month of Ramadan.
  • Location Address - Sheikh Zayed Road, Opposite Palm Jebel Ali - Dubai

Inclusions 

  • Entry ticket to Legoland Dubai
  • Full-day access to all prime rides and attractions

Items.Name: Big Bus Tour Dubai
Items.Description:
Our Big Bus tour is a great way to explore the Emirate city of Dubai in a leisurely fashion. Dubai has a lot on offer when it comes to sightseeing. While some may interest you so much that you would want to explore it further, you may be happy to look at some of the monuments and places from a distance. The 24- or 48-hour ticket of Big Bus Tour offers you a tour with your convenience. 

The Big Bus Tour happens on an open double-decker bus. While the lower level of the bus is fully air-conditioned, the upper deck is open air. You also receive running commentary of the places as the bus passes through them. The best part is that this commentary is available in 8 different languages.  

If during the journey, you find a place interesting, you can get down there to explore it further. The tour offers you free tickets to famous places like Dubai Museum and Sheikh Saeed Al Maktoum's house. You also get free passes to enjoy dhow cruise on Dubai Creek.

check out your Big bus city tour in Dubai tickets from meraTicket

The Big Bus ticket includes three routes the City Tour, Beach Tour, and the Marina Tour.

Inclusions

  • Package with 3 routes, 40 Stops & 12 Languages to choose from 
  • Hop-on, hop-off bus tour
  • Desert sunset tour
  • Panoramic Sharjah tour
  • Flamingo lagoon discovery
  • Palm Island drive 
  • Bottled water
  • Magical Night Tour (Panoramic)(If option is selected)
  • Downtown Discovery Guided Walking Tour(if option is selected).

       Inclusions of your trip vary as per ticket type selected, for details please view important information above.

Items.Name: Laguna Water Park
Items.Description:
Laguna Water Park is the newest entry in the list of Dubai's water parks. This brand new water park promises adventure, relaxation and lot of fun. If you want to take a day off from routine or sightseeing (if you are a tourist), this is the place to go. The Laguna Water Park offers exciting things and activities for people of all ages and interests.

The Laguna Water Park is divided into four zones: Surf, Splash, Slide and Relax. The park has WaveOz 180 FloRider where both beginners and professionals can go surfing. The Free Fall area has slides that would definitely get your heart pumping. Aqua Play is for both kids and adults who want to play with giant soaker buckets and fun waterslides. On the other hand, the water park has lots of places to relax. The Lazy River, the Pool and the Cabanas are perfect place to unwind and just do nothing. The water park also has several restaurants and cafes as well as stores for shopping.

If spending time at the Laguna Water Park seems ideal to you, opt for this package. Apart from arranging the entry tickets for you, we also provide transportation services.

Important Information

  • All e-tickets must be exchanged for wrist bands at the entrance.
  • Children under 13 years old must be accompanied by a responsible guardian of 18 years and above at all times.
  • Appropriate swimwear must be worn inside the park at all times. Please refer to park rules and regulation on our website
  • Online tickets do not include any food and beverage items unless specifically listed.
  • All e-ticket holders are subject to the rules and regulations of entry as displayed at the main entrance and at each ride.
  • The management reserves the right to alter the opening and closing time, remove or cancel any part of the experience for any reason including butnot limited to health and safety, operational issues, maintenance, special events and private functions.
  • Please follow lifeguard instructions at all times.
  • The management will not be responsible for any lost or stolen tickets.
  • Outside food and beverage is strictly prohibited and the management reserves the right to inspect all bags before entry into the park
  • Each ticket is valid for 1 guest only.

Inclusions

  • Laguna Water Park Admission Tickets
  • Access to the park’s four unique zones
  • Enjoy many thrilling rides including the GCC’s first-of-its-kind surfing attraction 
  • Unwind at its exclusive Relax zone

Banners.Name: Jallosh 2018
Banners.Description:
Gate Opens: Friday, 5:00 PM                                                   Event Starts: Friday, 06:00 PM

Avdhoot Gupte live musical concert "Jallosh 2018" 

A Marathi musical treat in Dubai presented by Morya Events Dubai in association with Meraki Events. 
For the first time in Dubai, Avdhoot Gupte will be Performing with a live band of musicians. 
Friday 21st Dec 2018 at Sheikh Rashid Auditorium Dubai.

Avadhoot Gupte is an Indian music composer and singer who is popularly known for his work in the Marathi film and music. Avadhoot started his career as a composer in the year 2002 when he composed a basic album of 8 songs on the theme of Rain (Marathi Title "Paus"). Avadhoot shot into fame instantly with this album and received the "Alpha Gaurav Puraskar" for the Best Composer 2002 for this album. 


His second album as a composer was an Indi-Pop album called "Aika Dajiba" which is considered to be a landmark in the field of Indian Pop Music. "Aika Dajiba" started the trend of Hindi pop songs with a Marathi punch line. His song received an unparalleled response from audiences of all ages worldwide. This album was followed with yet another super hit album "Meri Madhubala" which launched him as a pop singer. Thus from the first album, he composed, to his latest Avadhoot has an excellent track record of hits in an extremely short span of two years. 


In short, this young composer has started setting trends in the Indian music scene with his creativity and ability to experiment with different kinds of music. 

• Avdhoot was a judge at a most popular TV Show Sa Re Ga Ma Pa Little Champions on Zee Marathi. 
• Avdhoot moved to anchor a talk show on Zee Marathi titled Khupte Tithe Gupte. 
• Recently this year was a judge at popular Marathi Tv musical show Sur Nava Dhyas Nava for Colors Marathi. His first venture as a director was 2010 Marathi film, Zenda. 
• In his second venture, Morya, he touched the social subject of the famous Ganesh Festival in Mumbai.
• His third film titled was Jai Maharashtra Dhaba, Bhatinda. 
• As a producer, he gave a super hit blockbuster last year with Boyz and the sequel of Boyz 2 is to be released this coming year.

Banners.Name: SKI DUBAI
Banners.Description:
Take a break from the heat of Dubai and head to the ski park in the Mall of Emirates. Now, you do not have to wait in the long queue to get your tickets. We can arrange you the tickets for the direct entry to the park.

Nothing short of a wonder, Ski Park have been created inside a mall. Spread across an area of 22,500 square feet, the park includes an awesome snow park, five slopes of different heights and sizes and a really huge skiing area. You can try your hand at skiing, tobogganing and snowboarding and a lot of other adventures here.

You do not have to worry about the clothes and accessories that you need inside the cold atmosphere of the Ski Park. Right from the winter jacket to gloves, helmets and boots, everything would be provided just outside the park. They also provide you with skiing and snowboarding activities.

Whate1ver is your age, the ski park and snow world offer entertainment to everybody. So book your tickets with us and enjoy the rides, attractions, and activities of this wonderful park.

Important Information

  • The minimum skill requirement for use of the recreational slope is | stopping safely | Speed control | Linked turns | Ability to use the lifts.
  • Ski Dubai reserves the right to request proof of age.
  • The Ski Dubai Operational hours are Sunday - Wednesday: 10.00 am - 11.00 pm , Thursday: 10.00 am - 12.00 midnight , Friday: 09.00 am - 12.00 midnight , Saturday: 09.00 am - 11.00 pm
  • Location Address - Ski Dubai(Chinese Nationality Only), Sheikh Zayed Rd - Dubai

Special Note:-

  • Ski Dubai Management is authorize to refuse the entry, if they found this ticket holding by any nationality other then Chinese.

Inclusions

  • Ski Dubai Tickets (Depends on selection)
  • Experience all winter activities imaginable
  • Enjoy snowballing, try tobogganing, and create snowman, among others

Banners.Name: Russell Peters Deported Tour
Banners.Description:
Global comedy superstar Russell Peters is thrilled to announce his return to Dubai as part of his brand new Deported World Tour this summer.

The Deported World Tour kicked off in Australia and New Zealand in February 2018 and has already travelled to over 29 cities in 20 countries and been seen by over 100,000 fans worldwide.

Coca-Cola Arena, Dubai

Thursday, 6th June 2019

Doors Open: 7:00PM

Show Starts: 9:00PM

Terms and Conditions:

Children below 18 years old must be accompanied by an adult ticketholder.

Once you purchase the ticket, it is a condition of sale that there are no refunds, cancellations or exchanges.

By purchasing a ticket, a customer is automatically accepting all terms and conditions on the back of the ticket.

Attendees are encouraged to read the terms and conditions prior to entering the venue.No professional cameras or video cameras will be allowed into the venue.

No cameras with any zoom attachment will be allowed into the venue.

Banners.Name: Sunil Grover Unplugged
Banners.Description:
Sunil Grover (born 3 August 1977) is an Indian actor and stand up comedian. He came into limelight for his portrayal as Gutthi on Comedy Nights with Kapil but gained popularity for playing the role of Dr Mashoor Gulati on The Kapil Sharma Show. Grover will next be seen in Bollywood film Bharat.

Early life and family background

Sunil Grover was born in a Punjabi Hindu family of Mandi Dabwali, a small town of Sirsa, Haryana. His father was a bank manager. He has an elder sister and a younger brother. He completed his schooling from Mandi Dabwali and completed graduation from Guru Nanak College. He received master's degree in Theatre from Panjab University Chandigarh. He was interested in acting from his childhood and used to mimic his teachers.

Acting career

Sunil was discovered during his college days by the late satirist and comedian Jaspal Bhatti.[5] He has also acted in India's first silent comedy show, SAB TV's Gutur Gu in the initial 26 episodes. He was with comedian Kapil Sharma in the comedy show Comedy Nights with Kapil and became popular for playing comical characters: Gutthi, Rinku Bhabi and Dr. Mashoor Gulati.[6][7] Sunil debuted in the Punjab film industry, with Vaisakhi List in 2016 and the same year he portrayed the role of Shraddha Kapoor's father in the Baaghi movie.
